company.intro_en: ABC Chemical Co., Ltd. is a specialty chemical manufacturer focusing on calcium cyanamide and their downstream derivatives. Our products serve agriculture, nutrition, materials science and various industrial applications worldwide. As our business continues to grow, we are looking for talented, responsible and growth-minded professionals to join our team.
company.intro_zh: ABC 化工有限公司是一家专注于钙氰、双氰胺及其下游衍生物的精细化工生产企业。产品广泛应用于农业、营养品、材料科学以及全球工业领域。随着业务的不断发展，我们诚邀专业且负责、富有成长性的人才加盟。与公司共同打造高标准、高安全性、高品质的现代化工企业。

jobs.summary_en: Responsible for the daily operation management of chemical production lines, ensuring stable production, continuous improvement of efficiency and safety.
jobs.summary_zh: 负责化工生产线的日常运行管理，确保生产稳定运行、效率与安全持续改善。
responsibilities_en: Oversee daily chemical production operations and ensure compliance with safety & environmental standards
Coordinate production schedules, inventory, and quality control procedures
Lead process optimization and efficiency improvement initiatives
Manage production team and ensure proper training and SOPs adherence
Collaborate with R&D, QC, and maintenance teams to resolve production issues
responsibilities_zh: 监督化工生产日常运营，确保符合安全与环保标准
协调生产排程、库存与质量控制流程
主导工艺优化与效率改进项目
管理生产团队并确保培训与SOP执行
与研发、质检、维保团队协作解决生产问题
requirements_en: Bachelor's degree or above in Chemical Engineering, Chemistry, or related field
3+ years of experience in chemical production management
Strong knowledge of chemical safety, quality control, and regulatory compliance
Excellent problem-solving and team leadership skills
Proficiency in production planning and lean manufacturing principles
requirements_zh: 化工、化学或相关专业本科及以上学历
扎实的化工安全、质量控制与合规知识
出色的问题解决与团队领导能力
熟练掌握生产计划与精益制造原则
benefits_en: Comprehensive health insurance and retirement plans
benefits_zh: 具有竞争力的薪资与绩效奖金
完善的健康保险与退休计划

jobs.summary_en: Ensure product quality meets customer specifications and regulatory standards through testing, inspection, and quality system management.
jobs.summary_zh: 通过检测、检验与质量体系管理，确保产品质量符合客户规格与法规标准。
responsibilities_en: Conduct quality testing and analysis of raw materials, in-process samples, and finished products
Implement and maintain ISO 9001/14001/45001 quality management systems
Investigate quality issues and implement corrective and preventive actions (CAPA)
Prepare quality documentation, inspection reports, and COAs for customers
Coordinate with production and R&D teams for quality improvement projects
responsibilities_zh: 对原材料、中间样品与成品进行质量检测与分析
实施并维护ISO 9001/14001/45001质量管理体系
调查质量问题并实施纠正与预防措施（CAPA）
编制质量文档、检验报告与客户COA
与生产及研发团队协作推进质量改进项目
requirements_en: Bachelor's degree in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, or related field
2+ years of QA/QC experience in chemical industry
Familiarity with analytical instruments (HPLC, GC, UV, etc.)
Knowledge of ISO quality standards and GMP practices
Detail-oriented with strong analytical and documentation skills
requirements_zh: 化学、化工或相关专业本科学历
注重细节，具备较强分析与文档能力
benefits_en: Health insurance and annual health check-ups
benefits_zh: 具有竞争力的薪酬待遇

jobs.title_zh: 研发工程师 - 工艺开发
jobs.summary_en: Lead process development and optimization projects for calcium cyanamide derivatives and new product innovations.
jobs.summary_zh: 主导钙氰胺衍生物工艺开发与优化及新产品创新项目。
responsibilities_en: Design and conduct experiments for process development and optimization
Scale up laboratory processes to pilot and commercial production
Analyze reaction kinetics, yields, and process economics
Collaborate with production team for technology transfer
Prepare technical reports, patents, and R&D documentation
responsibilities_zh: 设计并执行工艺开发与优化实验
将实验室工艺放大至中试及商业化生产
分析反应动力学、收率与工艺经济性
与生产团队协作进行技术转移
编写技术报告、专利与研发文档
requirements_en: Master's degree or above in Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, or related field
2+ years of R&D experience in chemical industry
Strong knowledge of organic synthesis and process chemistry
Experience with reaction optimization and scale-up
Proficiency in analytical techniques and data analysis
requirements_zh: 化学、化工或相关专业硕士及以上学历
扎实的有机合成与工艺化学知识
熟练掌握分析技术与数据分析
benefits_zh: 具有竞争力的研发薪酬待遇
先进的研发设施与设备
持续学习与职业发展机会
